name: Remnants in the Sand (Breda University of Applied Sciences)
name_original: Remnants in the Sand (Breda University of Applied Sciences)
description:
Our journey takes place in Suneter, a sandy alien planet overrun by gigantic robots known as the Kubaras. 

Play as Arlo, a brave kid, who finds himself exploring a ruined temple in enemy territories together with his drone companion, Albi. While trying to stay clear from the Kubara’s watchful eye, they also try to unveil the reason behind their presence.

In this 3rd person adventure, you will explore the vast dunes, face the frightening mechanical harvesters and find remnants of a lost civilization in the sand.
